name: NORTH CAROLINA RAILROAD COMPANY
description: Private corporation that owns and manages a 317-mile rail corridor.
sampleDescriptions: Transportation policy that impacts railroads, including federal railroad grants; Department of Defense railroad use related to North Carolina military installations; H.R.2670, National Defense Authori
